titles.title: O, I Will Sing Unto You With Joy

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh, I will sing unto You with joy, Oh Lord. For You’re the rock of my salvation. I come before You with thanksgiving And extol You with a song.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}For You’re the greatest King above all else. You hold the depths of the earth in Your hand. Oh, I will sing unto You with joy, Oh Lord. For You’re the rock of my salvation.{/lang-eng}
